attributes.additional_details:
It is a distraction to efficient policing at a time when it is in increasing demand and under financial constraints. 

It is too vague in its definition and can be interpreted widely which has resulted in the impingement of the freedom of speech of law abiding citizens by the State.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to abolish the police practice of recording non-crime hate incidents.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701051
